meta.job_title: Industrial Steam Turbine Technical Field Advisor

duties_responsibilities.duty: Safely manage the maintenance and repair of various equipment used in power generation applications.
Lead the execution and oversight of projects on turbine generator equipment and auxiliary systems.
Pull, review, and interpret prints, such as manufacturing drawings, P&IDs, and schematic drawings.
Recognize, predict, and document potential failures and future outage recommendations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Engineering or a related field (Master's preferred)
